Sentence: After a few years, Valjean escapes from prison and heads to Montfermeil, where he (Valjean) is able to buy Cosette from the Th√©nardiers
Valjean and Cosette move to a run-down part of Paris
They find refuge in a convent, where Cosette attends school and Valjean works as a gardener
It is love at first sight, but the protective Valjean does his (Valjean) utmost to prevent Cosette and Marius from ever meeting
Worried that he (Valjean) will lose Cosette and unnerved by political unrest in the city, Valjean announces that he (Valjean) and Cosette are moving to England
When Marius returns to Cosette, she (Cosette) and Valjean have disappeared
Alarmed by this revelation and unaware that it was Valjean who saved his (Valjean) life at the barricades, Marius tries to prevent Cosette from having contact with Valjean
Ashamed that he (Valjean) mistrusted Valjean, Marius tells Cosette everything that has happened
Marius and Cosette rush to Valjean's side just in time for a final reconciliation
